Label: Study Identifier
XL Comments:
ML 3/30/2023: Include only cancer history related PARAMs in ADCH and add a new dataset ADBASE dataset like 303 which will contain all the baseline characteristics.
MS 4/3/2023: Ok. Please confirm ADBASE to be added outside of IDMC scope

Label: ADSL core variables are carried through all ADaM Datasets. See Core Variable column on the ADSL specs for variables kept on all ADaM datasets
Analysis Sequence Number
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: After sorting dataset by the KEYS, set to 1 for the first record per subject, then incremented by 1 for each subsequent record.
XL Comments: ML 2/7/25: Current ADBASE is filtering only records with ITTFL= 'Y'. This should be updated.

Label: Source Data
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Set to the name of the dataset from which AVAL or AVALC is sourced.
For all PARAMCD set to "CD"

Label: Source Variable
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Set to the name of the variable from which AVAL or AVALC is sourced.

Label: Source Sequence Number
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Set to the sequence number of the record from which AVAL or AVALC is sourced.

Label: Parameter (N)
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Assigned based on PARAMCD, as per the codelist

Label: Parameter
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Assigned as the decoded version of PARAMCD, as per the codelist

Label: Analysis Date
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
If AVALC contains a complete date, then ADT is set to the value of that date, as a SAS numeric date variable.
For parameters derived from other date parameters, retain ADT from the source record.

Label: Analysis Date Imputation Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Where PARAMCD='CHDTC'
Set based on imputations in ADT:
M if month and day are imputed
D if ony day is imputed
null if DIAGDT equals CD.CDDTC date part

Label: Analysis Relative Day
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Where ADSL.STAGE=EXPANSION:
If ADT < ADSL.RANDDT then calculated as (ADT - RANDDT). 
If ADT >= ADSL.RANDDT then calculated as (ADT - RANDDT + 1).
Null if ADSL.RANDDT is null.

Where ADSL.STAGE=ESCALATION:
If ADT < ADSL.TRTSDT then calculated as (ADT - TRTSDT). 
If ADT >= ADSL.TRTSDT then calculated as (ADT - TRTSDT + 1).
Null if ADSL.TRTSDT is null.

Label: Character Result/Finding in Std Format
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: For records directly from CD domain, set to CD.CDSTRESC

Label: Derivation Type
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: For records created because a subject is in ADSL, but is missing the expected record in CD domain, set to "PHANTOM".
